subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Women and Girls
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: La Course by le Tour de France, a women’s race around Paris set for Sunday, is a triumph for those who would like women to be more than hostesses at cycling’s premier event.
snippet: La Course by le Tour de France, a women’s race around Paris set for Sunday, is a triumph for those who would like women to be more than hostesses at cycling’s premier event.
